title: Pierre Omidyar
summary: Pierre Morad Omidyar (born Parviz Morad Omidyar, June 21, 1967) is a French-American billionaire technology entrepreneur, software engineer, and philanthropist. He is the founder of eBay where he served as chairman from 1998 to 2015.[3][4][3] Omidyar and his wife, Pamela, are philanthropists who founded Omidyar Network in 2004.
